required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.official_title: A Post-Market Registry of the BioFreedomTM Biolimus A9TM Coated Coronary Stent System

brief_summary.textblock:
Prospective, observational multi-center registry to be conducted at up to 25 French interventional cardiology centers. Patients will be eligible once they have received at least one BioFreedomTM DCS as per standard clinical practice and will be followed for up to 2 years post PCI for data collection.
The purpose of the registry is to explore the safety and effectiveness of the BioFreedomTM DCS in standard clinical practice in France and to serve as part of Post Market Surveillance.

detailed_description.textblock:
Prospective, observational multi-center registry to be conducted at up to 25 French interventional cardiology centers. Patients will be eligible once they have received at least one BioFreedomTM DCS as per standard clinical practice and will be followed for up to 2 years post PCI for data collection.
The registry will be purely observational and will not interfere with physician's decisions relating to stent selection or indication for treatment.
The purpose of the registry is to explore the safety and effectiveness of the BioFreedomTM DCS in standard clinical practice in France and to serve as part of Post Market Surveillance.

primary_outcome.description: Device-oriented composite endpoint (DOCE) at 12 months defined as composite of cardiovascular death (CD), myocardial infarction (MI) not clearly attributable to a non-target vessel and clinically driven target lesion revascularization (cd-TLR).

secondary_outcome.description: 1. All-cause mortality, CD, non-cardiovascular and undetermined death in hospital and at 12 and 24 months

secondary_outcome.measure: Patient-oriented composite endpoint (POCE) at 12 and 24 months
secondary_outcome.description: Patient-oriented composite endpoint (POCE) at 12 and 24 months defined as all-cause mortality, any stroke, any MI (including nontarget vessel territory) and any revascularization.

secondary_outcome.measure: Composite of Cardiovascular Death (CD) at 12 and 24 months
secondary_outcome.description: Composite of CD, MI and definite/probable stent thrombosis (ST) at 12 and 24 months.

secondary_outcome.measure: Target Vessel Failure defined at 12 and 24 months
secondary_outcome.description: Target Vessel Failure (TVF) defined as CD, target-vessel-related MI, and Target vessel revascularization (TVR) at 12 and 24 months

secondary_outcome.measure: Target Lesion Failure at 12 and 24 months
secondary_outcome.description: Target Lesion Failure (TLF) defined as CD, target-vessel-related MI, and clinically driven TLR at 12 and 24 months

secondary_outcome.measure: Clinically driven TLR at any follow-up time point
secondary_outcome.description: Clinically driven TLR at any follow-up time point

secondary_outcome.measure: Clinically driven TVR at any follow-up time point
secondary_outcome.description: Clinically driven TVR at any follow-up time point

secondary_outcome.time_frame: within 24 months following the index procedure
secondary_outcome.description: Any revascularization within 24 months following the index procedure, unless they are planned within the 1st month

study_pop.textblock: This observational registry is open to all patients with coronary artery disease treated by percutaneous coronary intervention (PCI) with one or more BioFreedom™ DCS within the indications of the Instructions for Use.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Patients treated with one or more BioFreedom™ DCS .Patients who agree to comply with the follow up requirements. .Patients with a life expectancy of > 1 year at time of consent. .Patients eligible to receive dual anti platelet therapy (DAPT).
- Patients who have signed an Informed Consent
Exclusion Criteria:
- Patients unable or unwilling to give documented informed consent
- Patients taking part in another interventional trial which has not completed follow-up for the primary endpoint .Patient has received an additional stent different from a BioFreedom™ DCS stent during the index procedure.
- Pregnant or breastfeeding women
- Planned surgery within 6 months of percutaneous coronary intervention (PCI) unless dual antiplatelet therapy is maintained throughout the peri surgical period for non HBR patients
- Planned surgery within 1 month of percutaneous coronary intervention (PCI) unless dual antiplatelet therapy is maintained throughout the peri surgical period for HBR patients
- Patients under judicial protection, tutorship or curatorship

facility.name: at Hôpital Privé Claude Galien ICPS
